wikipedia_page.main: Martha Ross (24 March 1939 – 14 January 2019) was a British actress and radio presenter.

response: Jonathan Stephen Ross was born on 17 November 1960 in St Pancras, North London and raised in Leytonstone, East London. The son of John and actress Martha Ross, he has four brothers and one sister. He is the younger brother of journalist, television editor, and media personality Paul Ross.
Ross’ mother, Martha Ross, died on 14 January 2019, at the age of 79.
He is the son of Martha Ross and the elder brother of Jonathan Ross.

In November 2006, he caused controversy by announcing an upcoming EastEnders Christmas storyline on his LBC show, causing his mother, Martha Ross, who told him the storyline, to be sacked from her job as an extra on EastEnders. Since then his mother has jokingly refused to speak to Paul unless, as she stated in a 2007 Radio Times interview, he presents her with some Ann Summers lingerie.
*The Attic, The Pearls and 3 Fine Girls – by Ann-Marie MacDonald, Alisa Palmer, Martha Ross
* Martha Ross (born 1939), British actress and radio presenter
*Rat Bag – by Martha Ross and John Millard
